thread.title: Louisville, head coach Rick Pitino mired in scandal
thread.title_full: Louisville, head coach Rick Pitino mired in scandal - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Associated Press
title: Louisville, head coach Rick Pitino mired in scandal
text:
Photo: Joe Raymond, Associated Press Louisville head coach Rick Pitino had Andre McGee as a player and on his staff. McGee is a central figure in a scandal. Louisville head coach Rick Pitino had Andre McGee as a player and...
Escort Katina Powell broke her silence Tuesday, saying she has no proof that Louisville head coach Rick Pitino knew that a former Cardinals staffer hired her and other dancers to strip and have sex with former recruits and players. Louisville head coach Rick Pitino had Andre McGee as a player and on his staff. McGee is a central figure in a scandal. Louisville head coach Rick Pitino had Andre McGee as a player and...
Escort Katina Powell broke her silence Tuesday, saying she has no proof that Louisville head coach Rick Pitino knew that a former Cardinals staffer hired her and other dancers to strip and have sex with former recruits and players.
